div.a: How A Beach Community Became A Deathtrap

div.div: The story behind the small beach community that bore the brunt of casualties caused by Hurricane Sandy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SFtgpK&via=Digg&text=How A Beach Community Became A Deathtrap

div.a: Details Emerge Around The F.B.I. Investigation Of David Petraeus

div.div: A State Department official's complaints about email stalking launched the monthslong criminal inquiry that led to a woman romantically linked to former Gen. David Petraeus and to his abrupt resignation.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TUEJFr&via=Digg&text=Details Emerge Around The F.B.I. Investigation Of David Petraeus

div.a: The New Fiber That Takes Us One Step Closer To Controlling Machines With Our Brains

div.div: An ultrathin electrode spun from a single carbon fiber can record neurons in living animals.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Za2GKY&via=Digg&text=The New Fiber That Takes Us One Step Closer To Controlling Machines With Our Brains

div.div: PROBABLY HAS THE BEST PORTA POTTIES

div.a: The Best Ending To An Obituary Ever

div.div: John E. 'Jack' Jones of Glenside died Saturday, Nov. 3, 2012. He has left behind the best kicker to an obituary ever. Thanks, Jack.

div.a: Inspiring Photos Of People Dancing Through Real Life

div.div: Have you ever felt like dancing in the street? The subjects of Jordan Matter’s Dancers Among Us series are probably doing it better than you.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Q6BpYI&via=Digg&text=Inspiring Photos Of People Dancing Through Real Life

div.a: Why Did The Tea Party Fail?

div.div: After riding into power on such a commanding victory in 2010's midterms, how did the Tea Party so completely fail to succeed in 2012.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UATt96&via=Digg&text=Why Did The Tea Party Fail?

div.a: A Short History Of Spies And Their Sex Scandals

div.a: Are Apple Stores Just Too Crowded?

div.div: Is there ever a time when an Apple store isn't populated by hordes of people? Does this diminish the Apple retail experience?

div.a: The Greatest Sports Photo of All Time

div.div: This photo is the greatest sports photo of all time — at least according to "Sports Illustrated."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UAnVAi&via=Digg&text=The Greatest Sports Photo of All Time

div.a: How This Man Learned A Language In 22 Hours

div.div: "What if, instead of tabbing over to the web browser in search of some nugget of gossip or news, we could scratch the itch by engaging in a meaningful activity, such as learning a language?"

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Q2H2Hq&via=Digg&text=How This Man Learned A Language In 22 Hours

div.div: So at a time when we can see video shot by a robot on Mars, when there are cars that can drive themselves, and when we can deposit checks on our smartphones without going to a bank, why do most people still have to go to a polling place to vote?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W1C4r4&via=Digg&text=Casting A Ballot By Smartphone

div.a: Nike+ FuelBand: One Big Security Hole For Your Life

div.div: What you may not realize is that, as cool as these gadgets purport to be, you may be signing up for more than you bargained for.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YZ2heh&via=Digg&text=Nike+ FuelBand: One Big Security Hole For Your Life

div.a: Apple Pays Swiss Rail $21 Million Over Clock

div.div: US tech giant Apple has dished out 20 million Swiss francs ($21 million, 17 million euros) to compensate Swiss national rail operator SBB for using its famous clock without permission.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SDAfjb&via=Digg&text=Apple Pays Swiss Rail $21 Million Over Clock

div.div: Using new technology, scientists have discovered that women just find it biologically easier to lie about personal information.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WPRnta&via=Digg&text=Sex, Lies, And The Brain

div.a: How I Was Drawn Into The Cult Of David Petraeus

div.div: The biggest irony surrounding Petraeus’ unexpected downfall is that he became a casualty of the very publicity machine he cultivated to portray him as superhuman. I have some insight into how that machine worked.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UvX6Tp&via=Digg&text=How I Was Drawn Into The Cult Of David Petraeus

div.div: Photographer David Liittschwager captures the amazing range of our world's biodiversity by placing a cube in different habitats and recording whatever moves through it

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S8f1cI&via=Digg&text=One Cubic Foot In Pictures
